test

The original scheme of syllables might be replaced or enhanced with a rich repertoire of sounds, similar to Caucasian languages ց cʿ. Over several millenia there must have been enormous creolic pressure to simplify the system phonetically. On the other hand, conflicting languages and merging consonant clusters might result in exotic sounds.

https://cdli.ox.ac.uk/wiki/sign_lists
